title: Leveraging Large Vision-Language Model as User Intent-aware Encoder for Composed Image Retrieval

abstract: Composed Image Retrieval (CIR) aims to retrieve target images from candidate set using a hybrid-modality query consisting of a reference image and a relative caption that describes the user intent. Recent studies attempt to utilize Vision-Language Pre …
